Class ImageConvertOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.groupdocs.conversion.contracts.ValueObject

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.aspose.ms.System.IEquatable<ValueObject>, IConvertOptions, IPagedConvertOptions, IPageRangedConvertOptions, IWatermarkedConvertOptions, Serializable, Cloneable

    public final class ImageConvertOptions
extends com.groupdocs.conversion.options.convert.CommonConvertOptions<ImageFileType>
implements Serializable

    Options for conversion to Image file type.
